entry.title: Networking issues
entry.content:
Feb 8, 09:00 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 8, 09:00 UTC
Update - The issues have been resolved.

Feb 8, 08:29 UTC
Investigating - Some users are experiencing networking issues right now. We are investigating.

entry.title: On-Air Issues
entry.content:
Jul 12, 20:42 UTC
Resolved - One of StreamYard’s cloud providers has resolved the issue.

Jul 12, 20:14 UTC
Investigating - On-Air is currently experiencing an issue. This is causing issues creating new webinars, updating webinars, and going live to On-Air. We are investigating.

entry.title: StreamYard On-Air Issue
entry.content:
Jul 5, 04:15 UTC
Resolved - The cloud provider has resolved the issue.

Jul 5, 03:45 UTC
Identified - One of our cloud providers is experiencing an outage. This is causing issues with On-Air Webinars.

Jul 5, 02:23 UTC
Investigating - On-Air is experiencing issues. We are currently investigating.

entry.title: On-Air live chat issue
entry.content:
Apr 20, 15:01 UTC
Resolved - This issue has been resolved.

Apr 20, 14:49 UTC
Identified - We have identified the issue and are implementing a fix.

Apr 20, 14:41 UTC
Investigating - The live chat for On-Air webinars is not loading. We are investigating.

entry.title: Uploading Issue
entry.content:
Apr 10, 19:50 UTC
Resolved - This issue has been resolved.

Apr 10, 19:22 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being shipped.

Apr 10, 18:44 UTC
Investigating - There is an issue uploading slides and video clips. We are investigating. In the meantime, we recommend screen sharing your slides or clicking Present > Video file.

entry.title: StreamYard Issue
entry.content:
Jan 28, 08:20 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 28, 08:14 UTC
Investigating - One of StreamYard's third party tools, Cloudflare, is experiencing an outage causing StreamYard not to load. We are investigating.

entry.title: Issue Scheduling Streams
entry.content:
Sep 20, 18:08 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 20, 17:23 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 20, 17:16 UTC
Investigating - There is an issue scheduling streams outside of the month of September. We are investigating.

entry.title: Watch Pages on Mobile Have No Audio
entry.content:
Sep 16, 22:00 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 16, 21:11 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 16, 20:54 UTC
Investigating - StreamYard Watch Pages (via the share link) on mobile devices do not have audio. We are investigating.

entry.title: Issue Sharing Extra Camera Angle
entry.content:
Sep 16, 17:23 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 16, 16:31 UTC
Investigating - There is an issue affecting sharing an extra camera. We are investigating.

entry.title: Reconnect Error
entry.content:
Sep 8, 14:45 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 8, 14:40 UTC
Identified - There is currently an issue reconnecting some destinations. We have identified the cause and are working on a fix.

entry.title: Elevated error rates
entry.content:
Jun 21, 07:34 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare’s fix has been implemented and the studio is now operational.

Jun 21, 07:06 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 21, 07:05 UTC
Update - One of our providers, Cloudlflare, is having issues. They have identified the issue and are shipping a fix.

Jun 21, 06:52 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 21, 06:50 UTC
Investigating - We are experiencing some issues and are investigating. You may have trouble creating broadcasts and going live.

entry.title: High Traffic
entry.content:
Mar 23, 23:31 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 23, 23:24 UTC
Monitoring - Traffic has returned to normal levels, we are monitoring.

Mar 23, 23:10 UTC
Investigating - Traffic is unexpectedly high right now. We're creating more resources to handle it. Please wait 30 to 60 seconds then try going live again.

entry.title: High Traffic
entry.content:
Mar 22, 22:46 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 22, 22:44 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented for the high traffic and we are monitoring the status.

Mar 22, 22:37 UTC
Investigating - Traffic is unexpectedly high right now. We're creating more resources to handle it. Please wait 30 to 60 seconds then try again.

entry.title: Pre-recorded Streaming Issue
entry.content:
Mar 15, 04:30 UTC
Resolved - From 9:45pm to 2:55am PST, there was an issue that caused some prerecorded streams to start later than the scheduled start time. This issue has been resolved and you shouldn't have any issues moving forward.

entry.title: Connection Issue
entry.content:
Mar 7, 18:28 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 7, 18:16 UTC
Investigating - We have identified a connection issue which may cause issues creating broadcasts, going live, or ending broadcasts. We are investigating.

entry.title: LinkedIn Comments Issue
entry.content:
Feb 16, 21:57 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 16, 21:57 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 16, 20:40 UTC
Investigating - Streams to LinkedIn are not receiving comments. This issue has been reported to LinkedIn and they are investigating a fix.

entry.title: LinkedIn Comments Issue
entry.content:
Feb 14, 23:27 UTC
Resolved - LinkedIn has resolved this issue.

Feb 14, 19:06 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Feb 14, 19:04 UTC
Identified - Streams to LinkedIn are not receiving comments. This issue has been reported to LinkedIn and they are investigating a fix.
